org.corfudb.runtime.clients

Class LogUnitClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.runtime.clients.LogUnitClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClient

    public class LogUnitClient
extends Object
    A client to send messages to a LogUnit.

    This class provides access to operations on a remote log unit. Created by mwei on 12/10/15.

    • Constructor Summary

      • setMaxWrite

        public LogUnitClient setMaxWrite(int limit)

      • write

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> write(long address,
                                        Set<UUID> streams,
                                        IMetadata.DataRank rank,
                                        Object writeObject,
                                        Map<UUID,Long> backpointerMap)
        Asynchronously write to the logging unit.
        Parameters:
        address - The address to write to.
        streams - The streams, if any, that this write belongs to.
        rank - The rank of this write (used for quorum replication).
        writeObject - The object, pre-serialization, to write.
        backpointerMap - The map of backpointers to write.
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture which will complete with the WriteResult once the write completes.

      • write

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> write(ILogData payload)
        Asynchronously write to the logging unit.
        Parameters:
        payload - The log data to write to the logging unit.
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture which will complete with the WriteResult once the write completes.

      • writeEmptyData

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> writeEmptyData(long address,
                                                 DataType type,
                                                 Set<UUID> streams,
                                                 IMetadata.DataRank rank)
        Asynchronously write an empty payload to the logging unit with ranked address space. Used from the quorum replication when filling holes or during the first phase of the recovery write.
        Parameters:
        address - The address to write to.
        type - The data type
        streams - The streams, if any, that this write belongs to.
        rank - The rank of this write]

      • read

        public CompletableFuture<ReadResponse> read(long address)
        Asynchronously read from the logging unit.
        Parameters:
        address - The address to read from.
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture which will complete with a ReadResult once the read completes.

      • read

        public CompletableFuture<ReadResponse> read(com.google.common.collect.Range<Long> range)
        Read data from the log unit server for a range of addresses.
        Parameters:
        range - Range of global offsets.
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture which returns a ReadResponse on completion.

      • read

        public CompletableFuture<ReadResponse> read(List<Long> list)
        Read data from the log unit server for a list of addresses.
        Parameters:
        list - list of global addresses.
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture which returns a ReadResponse on completion.

      • getTail

        public CompletableFuture<TailsResponse> getTail()
        Get the global tail maximum address the log unit has written.
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture which will complete with the globalTail once received.

      • getTrimMark

        public CompletableFuture<Long> getTrimMark()
        Get the starting address of a log unit.
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture for the starting address

      • prefixTrim

        public CompletableFuture<Void> prefixTrim(Token address)
        Send a prefix trim request that will trim the log up to a certian address
        Parameters:
        address - An address to trim up to (i.e. [0, address))

      • compact

        public CompletableFuture<Void> compact()

      • fillHole

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> fillHole(Token address)
        Fill a hole at a given address.
        Parameters:
        address - The address to fill a hole at.

      • writeRange

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> writeRange(List<LogData> range)
        Sends a request to write a range of addresses.
        Parameters:
        range - entries to write to the logunit. Must have at least one entry.
        Returns:
        Completable future which returns true on success.

      • resetLogUnit

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> resetLogUnit(long epoch)
        Send a reset request.
        Parameters:
        epoch - Epoch to check and set epochWaterMark.
        Returns:
        Completable future which returns true on success.
